title: Employee Onboarding Procedure
content: New employees must complete onboarding within 5 business days. Managers must submit the onboarding checklist to HR. The onboarding process includes: IT equipment setup (Day 1), HR orientation and paperwork (Day 1-2), Department introduction and training (Day 2-3), Security and compliance training (Day 3-4), Manager check-in and goal setting (Day 5). All new hires must complete the mandatory online training modules before the end of their first week. HR will track completion status and notify managers of any delays. The 5-business-day timeline ensures a smooth integration while maintaining productivity.
